text: My Dog Shep is a 1946 American drama movie directed by Ford Beebe and starring Flame, William Franum, Russell Simpson, Sarah Padden, Al St. John, Tom Neal, Craig Reynolds, Paul E. Burns. It was followed by Shep Comes Home in 1948 also directed by Ford Beebe. ==Other websites== * Category:1946 drama movies Category:American drama movies Category:Movies directed by Ford Beebe
title: My Dog Shep
